title: Old Reebok Font
content:
I'm having trouble identifying this font from an old Reebok ad.  
It looks a little like Futura Condensed / Avant Garde Condensed but isn't.  
Any help would be much appreciated. Thank you!

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114359im_/http:/typophile.com/files/One_Step_ahead.jpg)

Font: 

 Helvetica Condensed (Medium) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114359/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: chris_digi

comments.content:
An old version of **[Helvetica Condensed (Medium)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114359/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letraset%20%2F%20%28Commercial%29&ffam=Helvetica%20Condensed%20-%20Medium&fid=e15374217551c74c2f02a7dd7c1b8174&fsize=60&text=One%20step%20ahead.&fit=1)** by Letraset (1990) looks very close, but it's probably not available anymore.  
You can try to modify some Helvetica Narrow version...
Wow! Thanks so much. Much appreciated an happy new year fvilanakis!
